original.text: The lockers were extremely clean, safe and well-maintained. The whole process was very easy, the price was fair, and I felt completely comfortable and safe leaving my luggage here. Highly recommended!!

translations.author: Janine Stratemann
translations.original: {"language":"en","text":"The lockers were extremely clean, safe and well-maintained. The whole process was very easy, the price was fair, and I felt completely comfortable and safe leaving my luggage here. Highly recommended!!"}

original.text: Everything was super easy and straightforward. Dropping off my luggage was quick, and it felt safe and well-secured. Great experience overall!

translations.author: Angelina Hentschel
translations.original: {"language":"en","text":"Everything was super easy and straightforward. Dropping off my luggage was quick, and it felt safe and well-secured. Great experience overall!"}
